snippet: In his State of the City address on Tuesday, Mayor Bill de Blasio will try to convince New Yorkers that his plan to build more, and build higher, can improve residents’ lives.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio plans, in State of City address, to reveal a focus on denser and more affordable housing during his second year in office.
lead_paragraph: In his State of the City address on Tuesday, Mayor Bill de Blasio will try to convince New Yorkers that his plan to build more, and build higher, can improve residents’ lives.

headline.main: In 2nd Year, Mayor de Blasio Will Focus on Making Housing Denser and More Affordable
headline.print_headline: In 2nd Year, Mayor Will Focus on Making Housing Denser and More Affordable
